___policyDefinitions.description: An array of policy definition references.

___parameters.description: The policy set definition parameters that can be used in policy definition references.

___displayName.description: The display name of the policy set definition.

___policyType.description: The type of policy definition. Possible values are NotSpecified, BuiltIn, and Custom.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___parameters.description: Required if a parameter is used in policy rule.

___mode.description: The policy definition mode. Some examples are All, Indexed, Microsoft.KeyVault.Data.

___displayName.description: The display name of the policy definition.

___policyType.description: The type of policy definition. Possible values are NotSpecified, BuiltIn, and Custom.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___location.description: The location of the policy assignment. Only required when utilizing managed identity.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___identity.description: The managed identity associated with the policy assignment.

___policyDefinitionId.description: The ID of the policy definition or policy set definition being assigned.

___enforcementMode.description: The policy assignment enforcement mode. Possible values are Default and DoNotEnforce. DoNotEnforce indicates that the policy should evaluate but not take action (i.e. not deny or append).

___description.description: This message will be part of response in case of policy violation.

___parameters.description: Required if a parameter is used in policy rule.

___scope.description: The scope for the policy assignment.

___displayName.description: The display name of the policy assignment.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
The policy sku. This property is optional, obsolete, and will be ignored.

___name.description: The name of the policy sku. Possible values are A0 and A1.

___tier.description: The policy sku tier. Possible values are Free and Standard.

___sku.description: The policy sku. This property is optional, obsolete, and will be ignored.

___policyDefinitionId.description: The ID of the policy definition or policy set definition.

___parameters.description: Required if a parameter is used in policy rule.
